div.span: Scan for all variables and constants

div.div:
Found something:
foo
its value is null

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 219px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.span: All directives were executed, check all the
if everyone of them is free (i.e. no variable or constant is still pointing to it)
